channel.title: Need help with moparscape!
channel.description:
I've just set up an Hamachi Server and i got an account on it, but there are a few things that I want to change (if possible):
1. Can I make the members only zone accessible? 2. How can I access the guilds? 3. How do I stop the game from freezing? Or Unfreeze the game? 4. How do i get the rare armour and stuff like that? 5. Could I create re-spawning sites for rare items, monsters etc.?
Thanks for the help, DSDD

item.title: Need help with moparscape!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Erm, Try Using A Different Client Or, You Could Just Try Downloading The Client, About The Doors, Having Problems With That Sorry

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with moparscape!
item.dc:creator: @DSdragondude DSdragondude
item.description:
@DSdragondude wrote:

You are too kind I’ve tried restarting moparscape, but went I log in it always shows the loading - please wait screen. After that i can’t click anything it just freezes

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with moparscape!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

For Closing Mopar, Simply Click The X On The Corner, And Restart It (Basically Restarting It)
And Doors, Erm
Gimme 20 Mins And I’ll See If I Can Code Them For You

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with moparscape!
item.dc:creator: @DSdragondude DSdragondude
item.description:
@DSdragondude wrote:

Thanks for the quick reply Is there any codes already made for accessing the guilds? Because I’m such a beginner at java. and how do i reset moparscape?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with moparscape!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“DSdragondude, post:1, topic:103820”]I’ve just set up an Hamachi Server and i got an account on it, but there are a few things that I want to change (if possible):

  1. Can I make the members only zone accessible?
  2. How can I access the guilds?
  3. How do I stop the game from freezing? Or Unfreeze the game?
  4. How do i get the rare armour and stuff like that?
  5. Could I create re-spawning sites for rare items, monsters etc.?

Thanks for the help,
DSDD[/quote]

  1. No Idea, Ive Been Trying To Code The Same Thing
  2. Erm Find The Co-Ords, You’ll Have To Manually Add The Working Doors
  3. It Crashes From Time To Time, Reset Your Mopar Client And Reload It
  4. Depends, Most Admins Spawn It, Most Owners Put In Shops, But Theres Loads You Can Do
  5. Yep Autospawn.cfg + itemspawnpoints.java

Read full topic
